thread.title: Neuer hits Bundesliga record with 100 clean sheets
thread.title_full: Neuer hits Bundesliga record with 100 clean sheets

title: Neuer hits Bundesliga record with 100 clean sheets
text:
0 26-Feb-2017 03:13:26 The Germany international reached the milestone in record time, easily besting the mark previously set by Oliver Reck 
Bayern Munich goalkeeper Manuel Neuer set a Bundesliga record Saturday, becoming the fastest player to reach 100 clean sheets. 
The 30-year-old was in goal for Bayern's 8-0 thrashing of Hamburg at the Allianz Arena, a result which saw him hit a century of clean sheets in 183 matches. 
That mark easily bested the previous record of 232 matches, held by Werder Bremen's Oliver Reck. 
It was a milestone-filled afternoon for Bayern, who rolled to victory in Carlo Ancelotti's 1,000th match as a manager. 
Robert Lewandowski notched a hat trick for the hosts, who also got a brace from Kingsley Coman and goals from Arturo Vidal, David Alaba and Arjen Robben. 
Bayern sit at the top the Bundesliga table, five points clear of second-placed RB Leipzig. Related
